name: SurvivalZ
description: A virus ravaged the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone or in groups you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by living dead!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 - 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Intel Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphique Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
